code: import axios from'./axios';export var redirect=function redirect(path){return window.location.href=path;};export var setCategoryInfo=function setCategoryInfo(category){return{type:'SET_CATEGORY',payload:category};};export var getCategories=function getCategories(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/categories').then(function(response){dispatch(setCategoryInfo(response.data));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var updateCategoryInfo=function updateCategoryInfo(category){return{type:'CREATE_CATEGORY',payload:category};};export var addCategories=function addCategories(formdata,path){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/categories',formdata).then(function(response){dispatch(updateCategoryInfo(response.data));redirect(path);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var editCategoryInfo=function editCategoryInfo(category){return{type:'EDIT_CATEGORY',payload:category};};export var updateCategories=function updateCategories(formdata,path){return function(dispatch){axios.put('/categories/update',formdata).then(function(response){dispatch(editCategoryInfo(response.data));redirect(path);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
